ygData.subject: Re: Starting a paladin
ygData.msgSnippet: High charisma comes in handy after you get to that KOS (Kill On Sight) status with the militia.  It is a lot easier to get factions back up with a high
ygData.messageBody:
High charisma comes in handy after you get to that KOS (Kill On Sight)
status with the militia. It is a lot easier to get factions back up with a
high charisma. My wisdom is only 65, but I have not had a hard time with
any of my spells. My dodge skill works really well because of my base
skills that I recieved as a Half-Elf. The important thing is just to go
out and have fun. I just read a review in PC Accelerator magazine for
Everquest and they are so addicted that they have renamed the game in their
office to Eversmack. I just love the response that I get when I heal
someone when they are shouting for a cleric to help.

Tanaman - <Aradani>
Veeshan Server
